text: This wig is absolutely beautiful! The quality is amazing and it looks very natural. I wore it to a wedding and got so many compliments.
Love the texture and the lace is very soft. Easy to install and comfortable to wear all day.
Great value for money. The hair is soft and the color is exactly as shown in pictures.
Very disappointed. The wig started shedding after just one use. Not worth the price.
The lace is not transparent enough and looks fake. Also difficult to style.
Perfect for my daily routine. Lightweight and natural looking. Highly recommend!
